verses.name: Acts 4:21
verses.text: So when they had further threatened them, they let them go, finding nothing how they might punish them, because of the people: for all men glorified God for that which was done.

verses.name: Acts 4:22
verses.text: For the man was above forty years old, on whom this miracle of healing was shewed.

verses.name: Acts 4:23
verses.text: And being let go, they went to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them.
